import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Gets all blog posts with their metadata and content"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/BlogPosts"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a complete list of all available blog posts including their metadata and full content.
Posts are returned with their original publication order and include:
- Metadata (title, publication date, summary, optional image)
- URL-friendly slug
- Full MDX content

Sample response:
```json
[
  {
    "metadata": {
      "title": "Getting Started with React",
      "publishedAt": "2024-01-15",
      "summary": "Learn the basics of React development",
      "image": "react-intro.jpg"
    },
    "slug": "getting-started-with-react",
    "content": "# Getting Started with React\n\nReact is a..."
  }
]
```

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Returns the list of blog posts successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"required":["content","metadata","slug"],"type":"object","properties":{"metadata":{"required":["publishedAt","summary","title"],"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"maxLength":200,"minLength":1,"type":"string","description":"The title of the blog post","example":"Getting Started with React"},"publishedAt":{"minLength":1,"pattern":"^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}$","type":"string","description":"The publication date of the blog post in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD)","example":"2024-01-15"},"summary":{"maxLength":500,"minLength":10,"type":"string","description":"A brief summary of the blog post content","example":"Learn the fundamentals of React development with this comprehensive guide covering components, props, state, and hooks."},"image":{"maxLength":500,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"Optional featured image URL for the blog post","nullable":true,"example":"react-fundamentals.jpg"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"Represents metadata for a blog post extracted from MDX frontmatter","title":"PostMetadata"},"slug":{"maxLength":100,"minLength":1,"pattern":"^[a-z0-9]+(?:-[a-z0-9]+)*$","type":"string","description":"The URL-friendly slug derived from the filename","example":"getting-started-with-react"},"content":{"minLength":1,"type":"string","description":"The main content of the blog post (MDX content without frontmatter)","example":"# Getting Started with React\\n\\nReact is a powerful JavaScript library for building user interfaces..."}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"Represents a complete blog post with metadata, content, and slug","title":"BlogPost"}}}}},"500":{"description":"If there was an internal server error retrieving posts","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"title":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","nullable":true},"detail":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"instance":{"type":"string","nullable":true}},"additionalProperties":{},"title":"ProblemDetails"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
